alert.note: Alert for Columbia; Dane; Dodge; Jefferson (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 05 at 5:32AM CDT until April 05 at 6:15AM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Milwaukee/Sullivan has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Columbia County in south central Wisconsin... Central Dane County in south central Wisconsin... Northwestern Jefferson County in southeastern Wisconsin... Southwestern Dodge County in southeastern Wisconsin... * Until 615 AM CDT. * At 532 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Middleton to near Verona, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Madison, Sun Prairie, Fitchburg, Middleton, Waunakee, Verona, Oregon, McFarland, Monona, Windsor, Lake Mills, Marshall, Waterloo, Deforest, Cottage Grove, Deerfield, Shorewood Hills, Cambridge, Maple Bluff, and Lake Ripley. This includes the following Location Wisconsin State Capitol. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
